title: ‘Cuttin’ Grass Vol. 1 (The Butcher Shoppe Sessions)’ by Sturgill Simpson and ‘Boots No. 2: The Lost Songs’ by Gillian Welch Reviews: Roots-Music Retrospection
sub_head: Two singer-songwriters find rich rewards in revisiting their catalogs.
body: With their work lives disrupted by the pandemic, roots-music makers have been exploring their existing song catalogs for use in new ways. Two collections due out in physical form on Dec. 11 (and currently available digitally) demonstrate how backward glances can result in releases that are much more than placeholders.
